Text: WTF -- Are there people on teh internets who just download any torrent they find? (and not from TPB directly) --- 5 seeds and 11 leechers on a torrent that nobody but me should have been interested in. Whack.
Woe is me to be as bandwidth starved as I am so as not to consider the possibility of just downloading any random thing that crops up on a feed ;)
That's not yelling, and for the angry part...  you just look constipated...
Maybe I'm angry because I'm constipated? Yeah and I guess yer right its not so much yelling as talking in a silly voice.
